SEARCH
Package com.sportradar.livedata.sdk.feed.sdk

Class Sdk

java.lang.Object
com.sportradar.livedata.sdk.feed.sdk.Sdk
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class Sdk extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Represents a top-level access point used by user application to access the sdk functionality.

  • Method Details

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the Sdk instance and disposes all resources associated with it.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable

    • getInstance

      public static Sdk getInstance() throws SdkException
      Gets the singleton Sdk instance.
      Returns:
      the singleton Sdk instance.
      Throws:
      MissingPropertyException - A required property was not found in the configuration file
      InvalidPropertyException - The value(format) of the property was incorrect.
      MissingPropertyFileException - If property file is not found
      SdkException

    • getLiveScout

      public LiveScoutFeed getLiveScout()
      Gets the LiveScoutFeed implementation used to manage the live-scout feed.
      Returns:
      the LiveScoutFeed implementation used to manage the live-scout feed or a null reference if live-scout related functionality is disabled in the configuration file.

    • getVersion

      public String getVersion()
      Gets SDK version
      Returns:
      SDK version

    • init

      public static void init(Properties properties) throws SdkException
      Initialize SDK with passed Properties instance Call to this method is optional. If you want initialize SDK with properties read from properties file call getInstance() directly
      Parameters:
      properties - SDK properties
      Throws:
      SdkException - if there was an error in SDK initialization
      IllegalStateException - if SDK is already initialized
